snippet: A candidate seeking to position himself as the alternative to Donald Trump could make a better case by coming in first somewhere. But where?
abstract: The Upshot; states where Sen Marco Rubio has best chance of winning featured; Rubio has not won state primary or caucus to date.
lead_paragraph: A candidate seeking to position himself as the alternative to Donald Trump could make a better case by coming in first somewhere. But where?

headline.print_headline: States Where Rubio Might Have a Chance
headline.main: Where Marco Rubio Has the Best Chance to Win
